statements.sql: select * from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'nfcpay' and table_name = 'script' and table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
select count(*) as aggregate from `announcement_categories` where `id` = '1'
select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'nfcpay' and table_name = 'announcements'

insert into `announcements` (`slug`, `announcement_category_id`, `data`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('is-now-a-good-time-to-worry-more-about-financial', '1', '{\"language\":{\"en\":{\"title\":\"Is Now A Good Time To Worry More About Financial.\",\"description\":\"

NFC technology is a standard feature of mobile handsets and payment cards. NFC is most suitable for ultra-short range (<2cm or one inch), low-latency startup, connect and transfer. And unique to NFC, connections can exchange power at a maximum of 1w.<\/p>

Near-Field Communication (NFC) technology came to market as an efficient, secure data transfer protocol which has enabled the contactless payment lifestyle. But like most enduring disruptive technologies, it has continued to evolve beyond this initial use case.<\/p>

Every day, millions of people set data in motion by using IoT-enabled technology to connect physical objects to the digital world. Brands can now choose the new sustainable NFC tags for an eco-friendly experience with a low carbon footprint, or the tiny tags to make even the smallest object interactive, ideal for medical applications, pharmaceuticals, and consumer products with limited space.<\/p>

In spite of the shortages brought on by the COVID-19 pandemic, Lean manufacturing is still highly relevant. The difference is that digital technologies are now essential because they provide data-driven and real-time insights into production lines and entire supply chains.<\/p>

The report analysed major NFT projects, like the Yuga Labs project Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC), Gary Vaynerchuk\'s VeeFriends, World of Women, and social platforms Decentraland and Sandbox.<\/p>

 <\/p>

Former NFC Forum Chair and SONY Executive Honored for Outstanding Leadership and Commitment to NFC Technology<\/i><\/p>

JHON SMITH<\/i><\/p><\/blockquote>

Greenwood Village, CO \u2013 March 21, 2023 - Tapwow, a leading provider of cloud-based IoT software solutions, is proud to announce a new strategic partnership with Identiv, a global leader in digital security and identification in the Internet of Things (IoT), to offer a set of comprehensive IoT solutions for smart packaging, including customer engagement, authentication, product diversion and traceability.<\/p>

Mobility as a Service (MaaS) changes how we think about public transport services. It solves the current fragmentation between different services and encourages transport operators to deliver a complete \u2018mobility experience\u2019, from the moment you leave your home until you reach your final destination.<\/p>

Checking in on the Wayfinding Mark, and how it\u2019s being used six months after its release.<\/p>

Connected, battery-powered devices have transformed our existence. Yet a familiar problem remains. As the number of devices has increased, so too have the cables, plug sockets, proprietary adaptors, extensions and complex charging mechanisms that are needed.<\/p>\",\"tags\":[\"blog\"]},\"es\":{\"title\":null,\"description\":null},\"ar\":{\"title\":null,\"description\":null}},\"image\":\"7117b72e-a704-431e-82e7-48848443b014.webp\"}', '2024-03-27 07:54:10', '2024-03-27 07:54:10')

And unique to NFC, connections can exchange power at a maximum of 1w.<\/p><p>Near-Field Communication (NFC) technology came to market as an efficient, secure data transfer protocol which has enabled the contactless payment lifestyle. But like most enduring disruptive technologies, it has continued to evolve beyond this initial use case.<\/p><p>Every day, millions of people set data in motion by using IoT-enabled technology to connect physical objects to the digital world. The difference is that digital technologies are now essential because they provide data-driven and real-time insights into production lines and entire supply chains.<\/p><p>The report analysed major NFT projects, like the Yuga Labs project Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC), Gary Vaynerchuk's VeeFriends, World of Women, and social platforms Decentraland and Sandbox.<\/p><blockquote><p> <\/p><p><i>Former NFC Forum Chair and SONY Executive Honored for Outstanding Leadership and Commitment to NFC Technology<\/i><\/p><p><i>JHON SMITH<\/i><\/p><\/blockquote><p>Greenwood Village, CO \u2013 March 21, 2023 - Tapwow, a leading provider of cloud-based IoT software solutions, is proud to announce a new strategic partnership with Identiv, a global leader in digital security and identification in the Internet of Things (IoT), to offer a set of comprehensive IoT solutions for smart packaging, including customer engagement, authentication, product diversion and traceability.<\/p><p>Mobility as a Service (MaaS) changes how we think about public transport services. It solves the current fragmentation between different services and encourages transport operators to deliver a complete \u2018mobility experience\u2019, from the moment you leave your home until you reach your final destination.<\/p><p>Checking in on the Wayfinding Mark, and how it\u2019s being used six months after its release.<\/p><p>Connected, battery-powered devices have transformed our existence. As the number of devices has increased, so too have the cables, plug sockets, proprietary adaptors, extensions and complex charging mechanisms that are needed.<\/p>","tags":["blog"]},"es":{"title":null,"description":null},"ar":{"title":null,"description":null}},"image":"7117b72e-a704-431e-82e7-48848443b014.webp"}

  "en_title" => "Is Now A Good Time To Worry More About Financial."
  "en_description" => "<p>NFC technology is a standard feature of mobile handsets and payment cards. NFC is most suitable for ultra-short range (<2cm or one inch), low-latency startup, connect and transfer. And unique to NFC, connections can exchange power at a maximum of 1w.</p><p>Near-Field Communication (NFC) technology came to market as an efficient, secure data transfer protocol which has enabled the contactless payment lifestyle. But like most enduring disruptive technologies, it has continued to evolve beyond this initial use case.</p><p>Every day, millions of people set data in motion by using IoT-enabled technology to connect physical objects to the digital world. Brands can now choose the new sustainable NFC tags for an eco-friendly experience with a low carbon footprint, or the tiny tags to make even the smallest object interactive, ideal for medical applications, pharmaceuticals, and consumer products with limited space.</p><p>In spite of the shortages brought on by the COVID-19 pandemic, Lean manufacturing is still highly relevant. The difference is that digital technologies are now essential because they provide data-driven and real-time insights into production lines and entire supply chains.</p><p>The report analysed major NFT projects, like the Yuga Labs project Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC), Gary Vaynerchuk's VeeFriends, World of Women, and social platforms Decentraland and Sandbox.</p><blockquote><p> </p><p><i>Former NFC Forum Chair and SONY Executive Honored for Outstanding Leadership and Commitment to NFC Technology</i></p><p><i>JHON SMITH</i></p></blockquote><p>Greenwood Village, CO – March 21, 2023 - Tapwow, a leading provider of cloud-based IoT software solutions, is proud to announce a new strategic partnership with Identiv, a global leader in digital security and identification in the Internet of Things (IoT), to offer a set of comprehensive IoT solutions for smart packaging, including customer engagement, authentication, product diversion and traceability.</p><p>Mobility as a Service (MaaS) changes how we think about public transport services. It solves the current fragmentation between different services and encourages transport operators to deliver a complete ‘mobility experience’, from the moment you leave your home until you reach your final destination.</p><p>Checking in on the Wayfinding Mark, and how it’s being used six months after its release.</p><p>Connected, battery-powered devices have transformed our existence. Yet a familiar problem remains. As the number of devices has increased, so too have the cables, plug sockets, proprietary adaptors, extensions and complex charging mechanisms that are needed.</p>"
